[URLOTW] Learn Go with tests

Aug 3, 2019 ・ 1 min read

URLOTW or URL of the week or Uniform Resource Locator of the week is a kind of post where I share a relevant URL for you :-)

This week the winner is Learn Go with test-driven development (https://github.com/quii/learn-go-with-tests).

It’s is a super engaging tutorial, and I cannot stop reading it. It teaches you simple and every-day-Go-APIs by using TDD (it looks dull when I say, but it’s not).

I hope you enjoy it ;-)
